overview: Stefan Groschupf is the co-founder and CEO of Datameer and is well known for his entrepreneurial accomplishments in data management and large-scale distributed computing. Before Datameer, Stefan was the co-founder and CEO of Scale Unlimited, a leading provider of educational and consulting services for Hadoop and related technologies with proven success in companies such as HP, Sun, Apple, Deutsche Telekom and Nokia. Earlier, Stefan was CEO of 101tec, a supplier of Hadoop and Nutch-based search and text classification software to industry-leading companies such as DHL and EMI Music. Stefan has also served as CTO at Thinglink, a developer of social objects used in social interaction design, as well as at Sproose, a social search engine company.
